fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Refine a player, changing their role into another role that the host views as a somewhat direct upgrade to their current role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a role can't be upgraded, they instead gain an increase to their attack and defense tier, gaining an attack ability if they didn't already. You are not notified of this.
- If you self target, you become Very Fine (3791).
